channel.title: This pops up when i log into my client! PLEASE HELP! lot of hours
channel.description:
:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
[size=14pt]This message pops up whenever i login to my client, i have alot of work put into this server, and i dont know how to fix this damn problem, has anyone ever had this problem, is there a fix?[/size]
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:504) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at client.drawPrayerOrb(client.java:11231) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:11383) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9547) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10379) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5664) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
[size=24pt]Also happens when i run other clients and sources. I am running project inanity btw.
Thanks in advance for the help!!![/size]

item.title: This pops up when i log into my client! PLEASE HELP! lot of hours

@Fisher9696 wrote:

Bumb, i still cant figure this out?!?!?

item.title: This pops up when i log into my client! PLEASE HELP! lot of hours
item.dc:creator: @Fisher9696 Fisher9696
item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

The string inside of your prayer orb was not converted to one of the numeric types, because that string does not have the appropriate format.

Yeah but it happens to more than one client and server!! Like it isnt just one im using…

Read full topic

item.title: This pops up when i log into my client! PLEASE HELP! lot of hours
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : ""

This is looking for a 32-bit integer, either the number exceeds 2147 million, or doesn’t exist. From the looks of it, the blank space in-between the quotes should be filled by a number.

Read full topic

item.title: This pops up when i log into my client! PLEASE HELP! lot of hours
item.dc:creator: @Fisher9696 Fisher9696
item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

[size=14pt]This message pops up whenever i login to my client, i have alot of work put into this server, and i dont know how to fix this damn problem, has anyone ever had this problem, is there a fix?[/size]

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string
: “”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:504)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527)
at client.drawPrayerOrb(client.java:11231)
at client.drawMinimap(client.java:11383)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9547)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:10379)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:5664)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

[size=24pt]Also happens when i run other clients and sources. I am running project inanity btw.

Thanks in advance for the help!!![/size]

Read full topic
